attributes.action: apply EU regulations interms of underage online usage
attributes.additional_details:
the number of complaints received from underage online,due to threats,sexual materials are quite high
which are a waste for police resources,not only in uk&but for other countries resources when complaint is against a person outside uk from uk
social media contains adult material,weather they shared directly to underage or by others in main pages
also underage will use facebook to send explicit material,according to a survey

attributes.background:
I to write a pledge to you,inorder to apply the EU regulations,in terms of the cyber crime related to the under age topic. The proposed rule comes as part of a major overhaul of data protection laws
the eu regulations state that underage (under 16)have to use social media only with parental consent

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
